title: Announcement, Review Committee Selections: Barbara Dorchen, David Greenwood, Ellen Moucoulis, Tom Terry, 1990
title_raw: Review Committee Selections: Barbara Dorchen, David Greenwood, Ellen Moucoulis, Tom Terry
signed: Signature imprinted in blue ink beneath wave image: DESIGN: ED-/WARD FELLA, KEEPING/THE INCONSISTENT IRREGULARITIES exceptional!
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in blue across upper half of sheet: REVIEW COMMITTEE SELECTIONS/ BARBARA DORCHEN/ DAVID GREENWOOD/ ELLEN MOUCOULIS/ TOM TERRY 1990/ SEPTEMBER 7TH, OCTOBER 6TH/ OPENING RECEPTION: FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 7, 5:30-8:30PM; across lower left quadrant: JURORS: 1989/90 REVIEW COMMITTEE:/ HERB BABCOCK/ BEN MITCHELL/ SANDRA OSIP/ VALERIE PARKS/ BILL SANDERS/ ANAT SHIFTAN/ RICHARD WASHINGTON; across lower edge: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN 3RD FLOOR DETROIT MICHIGAN 48226/ TELEPHONE: (313) 962-9025/ HOURS: WEDNESDAY--SATURDAY, 12-6PM/ ALSO IN THE AREA: DETROIT ART-/ ISTS MARKET, SEPT 7-OCT5/ TWO APPROACHES TO ABSTRACT PAINTING
Verso: Imprinted in blue across upper right quadrant: REVIEW; across upper center: COMMITTEE SELECTIONS:/ across lower left quadrant: ACROSS FROM THE BRICKTOWN PEOPLE MOVER STATION/ DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 3RD FLOOR/ 743 BEAUBIEN DETROIT, MICHIGAN 48226/ WITH SUPPORT FROM:/ NATIONAL ENDOWMENT FOR THE ARTS/ MICHIGAN/ COUNCIL/ FOR THE ARTS DETROIT COUNCIL/ FOR/ THE/ ARTS/ EQUAL OPPORTUNITY ORGANIZATION/ MEMBER OF NAA O; across lower right quadrant: NON-PROFIT ORG./ BULK RATE/ U.S./ POSTAGE/ PAID/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN/ PERMIT NO 2 960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in dark blue ink for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed. 
Recto: [Printed] hand lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles, giving exhibition title, participating artists, dates, times, location, contact and additional information.  
Verso: Center right, exhibition title, abstract image of waves.  Lower half of sheet, [printed] hand-lettered text in variety of sizes, styles giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Review Committee Selections: Barbara Dorchen, David Greenwood, Ellen Moucoulis, Tom Terry, 1990. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-45
